meta.name: Personal Task Management App
meta.description: A simple task management app for creating and editing tasks with minimal features.

features.name: Task Creation
features.description: Create new tasks with a title and optional due date.
userStories: As a user, I want to create new tasks with minimal features.

features.name: Task Editing
features.description: Edit existing tasks by updating their titles or due dates.
userStories: As a user, I want to edit existing tasks with minimal features.
